parameters.title: Parameters of the N-of-1 test
parameters.same-substance-warning: If you want to use the same substance several times (e.g. comparison at different dosages), please add an entry for each and name them differently (name and abbreviation).
parameters.subtitle-randomStrategy: Randomization strategy of the administration scheme
parameters.randomStrategy-desc: Choose the strategy that will be used to alternate the administration of the different substances selected.
parameters.RS-permutation: Random repetition of sequence of permutations of all substances
parameters.RS-permutation-helper:
For example with 2 selected substances, A and B. It will be a repetition of the permutation sequences AB or BA. Example : AB AB BA ...
With 3 substances: A, B and C. It will be a repetition of the permutation sequences ABC, ACB, BCA, etc...
And so on.
parameters.RS-random-max-rep: Random, but with a maximum number of consecutive repetitions of the same substance
parameters.posology-desc:
Indicate the total expected morning, noon, evening and night doses for the selected substances.
The "Fraction(s)" columns can optionally be used to indicate how many parts the dose should be divided into, in order to allow for spontaneous adaptation when taking the medication (if Morning = 100 and Fraction(s) = 2, the system will provide 2 doses of 50).
parameters.posology-repeat-switch: Repeat the last day's dosage for the next period, if two consecutive periods involve the same substance.
parameters.warning-save-posology: (Don't forget to save the modifications, otherwise they won't be taken into account)
parameters.warning-config-posology: (*Set up the substances and the duration of the test before setting up the dosages. You will not be able to change these after clicking on the button.)
